ygData.subject: Re: A rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They aren t very entertaining as of late.  Still I hope, I come back everyday thinking it will be a better world.  Tomorrow, perhaps. ... The word
ygData.messageBody:
> Verant _knows_ that they are in the entertainment business.

They aren't very entertaining as of late. Still I hope, I come
back everyday thinking it will be a better world. Tomorrow, perhaps.

> Sometimes they will make mistakes.

The word sometimes here isn't strong enough, Most of the time works.

> But any time there is a change in the status quo - you will hear complaints.

Or when they decide to just completely break your songs/skills,
you'll hear complaints then too.

Btw, add this to the bugs list. Safe Fall doesn't work in the zone
to which you logged into. I took 120 dmg jumping off a cliff in
Everfrost when I usually take about 30. Harmonic chalks up another.
Stamina drain, safe fall broken, I bet other skills fail to apply
themselves in the zone you appear at. I don't even bother to feed-
back anymore, not worth my time since they are adding echo-ing to
caves and dungeons and I don't wanna disturb them. =)

Harmonic.
